text: A tuffet, hassock, or a pouffe is a piece of furniture used as a footstool or low seat.It can also meana clump of something (eg: Grass tuffets). It is mentioned in Little Miss Muffet as so: Little miss Muffet, she sat on her tuffet Eating her curds and whey Along came a spider, who sat down beside her And frightened miss Muffet away Little miss Muffet, she sat on her tuffet Eating her curds and whey Along came a spider, who sat down beside her And frightened miss Muffet away The imperfect limerick does not say if miss Muffet sat on grass tufts or a low seat.
title: Tuffet
